snippet: A spot on the yearly scroll of recently deceased movie luminaries has become one of the most hotly contested honors of the Oscar show.
abstract: Spot on the yearly scroll of recently deceased movie luminaries has become one of the most hotly contested honors of the Academy Awards show; as in most Oscar races, it is the focus of sometimes ferocious campaigning; members of a committee of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences are measuring celebrity, weighing achievement and trying to ward off entreaties from those who believe their candidate should have a last moment in the limelight.
lead_paragraph: A spot on the yearly scroll of recently deceased movie luminaries has become one of the most hotly contested honors of the Oscar show.

headline.seo: Even the Oscar Memorial List Is a Focus of Campaigning
headline.main: Even for the Dead, There’s a Race to Make the A-List at Oscars
headline.print_headline: Even for the Dead, There’s a Race to Make the A-List at Oscars

keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
keywords.name: organizations
